arts.ttl: “Nobody understands except Textor” – Coach on confusion for players around Crystal Palace, Lyon and Botafogo
arts.sum: Former Lyon, Botafogo and Molenbeek coach Claudio Caçapa has admitted John Textor is leaving the players at the clubs a little lost as he looks to sell his Crystal Palace shares to keep Lyon afloat.
